heading: Frances Richens
about:
I am a writer and editor, specialising in arts, cultural, food, travel and lifestyle content. I have over 10 years of experience in journalism, editing, communications and marketing.

Before going freelance, I held senior writing and editing positions within B2B and consumer publications, as well as nonprofit arts organisations. I have been published in The Guardian, Daily Telegraph, ArtsProfessional, Time Out and Mouth London.

This website showcases a select portfolio of my journalistic and marketing writing. [My CV can be downloaded here.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15o-Mlon8bL2mPjFCuJmMoeI5jeez9os5/view?usp=sharing)

Iâ€™m a UK national, currently based in Canada and looking for remote, contract jobs.
